description: Least common multiple of the first n composite numbers.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: t=t=Select[ Range[ 1, 100 ], !PrimeQ[ # ] & ] Table[ Apply[ LCM, Table[ Part[ t, w ], {w, 1, s} ] ], {s, 1, 40} ]
prog: (Haskell)a025543 n = a025543_list !! na025543_list = scanl lcm 1 a002808_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
